com.nokia.lwuit
Class TextEditorProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.nokia.lwuit.TextEditorProvider

public abstract class TextEditorProvider
extends java.lang.Object

This class hides away the actual Nokia texteditor implementation. Making it possible to run lwuit in devices that doesn't support Nokia UI API. The methods are mirrored from the actual TextEditor class.

Nested Class Summary
static interface TextEditorProvider.TextEditorListener
          A listener for receiving notification of content changes and other editor events from TextEditor objects.

Method Detail

delete

public abstract void delete(int offset,
                            int length)
Deletes characters from the TextEditorProvider

Parameters:
offset - the beginning of the region to be deleted.
length - the number of characters to be deleted.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - if the resulting contents would be illegal for the current input constraints java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException - if offset and length do not specify a valid range within the content of the TextEditorProvider
